channel.title: How do i make a link Short
channel.description: For example :[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,110704.0.html]ClickHere[/url] how do i make that.. How do i make it so that whole link becomes .. [url=http://Click Here]Click Here[/url]

item.title: How do i make a link Short
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

zammyking111:

I think you just answered yourself

  1. No he didnt, did you even click the link, it takes you to “clickhere//”

  2. im not the best at it, but im pretty sure you:

add “url]www.YOURURLHERE[/url” *

this is where i forgot, its like “url=YOUR URL HERE]YOUR MESSAGE HERE[/url”

EDIT: ^^^^^Checked below, and this works!^^^^^

not exactly sure, try it.

  • = (add a [ at the beginning and a ] at the end, inside the quotes)

Im gonna do a few just to check:

CLICK HERE TO VISIT MY SERVER’S HOMEPAGE! IT ROCKS YOUR SOCKS, BECASUE IT HAS: FORUMS, A ADMIN “HELPLINE” AND A REPORT ABUSE FORM!
